sentence.Network_en: Any derogation of the common law is to be strictly construed.
sentence.Network_cn: 对习惯法的任何删减必须经过严格的解释.

sentence.Network_en: However, the derogation applies only to certain specified agricultural crops.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过这项农民免责只限定于某些特定的农业作物.

sentence.Network_en: Nothing in this Agreement may be interpreted as derogation to compulsory provisions of law.
sentence.Network_cn: 该协议中的任何条款均不可以被解释为对强制性的法律规定的损毁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... derogate 贬损 derogation 毁损 derogative 减损的.
航海及海运专业词汇英语翻译(D12) ... Derlin 缩醛树脂 derogation 减损 derrick arrangement 吊杆布置.

list.abs: Disparage诽谤，蔑视Derogatory derogate 贬低诽谤Denigrate 诋毁污蔑
a word with a derogative tincture ., 有贬义色彩的词.

people often derogate others in social comparison and the past selves in temporal comparison , so that they can achieve self-enhancement and ultimately get good self-feelings .在社会比较中人们会贬低他人，在时间比较中人们会贬低过去的自我，从而来达到提高自我，最终使现在的自我感觉良好。
derogation of intensity of sound in measuring sound velocity by resonance interference method共振干涉法声速测定中声强减损的讨论

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'impairment of the force of'): from Latin derogatio(n-), from the verb derogare (see derogate)

means.word_mean: 1. a communication that belittles somebody or something
2. (law) the partial taking away of the effectiveness of a law; a partial repeal or abolition of a law;

sentences.sentence: "any derogation of the common law is to be strictly construed"

auth_sentence.content: Papal usurpations, to the derogation of the crown.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Papal usurpations, to the derogation of the crown.

auth_sentence.content: No derogation or defamation of Nike company, Nike brand or Nike products.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: No derogation or defamation of Nike company, Nike brand or Nike products.

auth_sentence.content: However, a derogation is available in exceptional circumstances, and we desperately need this to be applied.
